name: Hive
headline: Email and SMS marketing platform
description:
Hive is an email & SMS marketing CRM used by brands to personalize and automate their campaigns. We pride ourselves on helping brands understand their email marketing, all while selling more and keeping their customers engaged.

We integrate with tech partners like Shopify and Eventbrite to let brands act on all their data, so they can easily segment their list in thousands of ways, and send more customized, timely email campaigns that land in inboxes.
generated_description:
Hive is an innovative email and SMS marketing platform that started in 2014, designed specifically for event promoters. Based in Kitchener, Canada, and part of Y Combinator's S14 batch, Hive has quickly become a go-to tool for brands aiming to personalize and automate their marketing campaigns. The company employs about 40 passionate individuals, all working towards one goal: enhancing engagement for brands and driving ticket sales.

At its core, Hive believes in the power of data integration. By connecting with platforms like Shopify and Eventbrite, they empower users to leverage their data for highly customized marketing strategies. This capability allows brands to segment their audiences into thousands of unique lists, facilitating tailored and timely campaigns that are more likely to land in inboxes.

Hive's suite of features is robust. It includes email marketing, SMS campaigns, CRM functionalities for managing ticket buyers, campaign automation tools, reporting dashboards, and integration with ticketing partners. Each feature is crafted to meet the unique needs of industries like music events, festivals, fairs, and comedy shows. 

One standout aspect of Hive’s offering is its focus on event marketing. The platform not only helps manage campaigns but also tracks their performance, providing insights that are crucial for making informed business decisions. Users can monitor ticket sales directly linked to their campaigns, which brings sales data right to their fingertips.

For brands looking to enhance their marketing efforts while simplifying their processes, Hive offers a centralized solution that integrates marketing and ticketing. They're dedicated to making event promotion a seamless experience, ensuring that every promotional effort contributes directly to increasing ticket sales.

If you're an event promoter striving to optimize your outreach and engagement strategies, Hive’s resources—including templates, guides, and invaluable insights—are available to assist in your journey. For anyone interested in experiencing what Hive can do, booking a demo or exploring their extensive resource library is just a click away at [www.hive.co](http://www.hive.co). 

In a world where personalized engagement is paramount, Hive is making strides to keep brands connected with their audiences, proving that effective marketing doesn't have to be complex—it's about working smarter.
